text: قال فبما اغويتنى لاقعدن لهم صرطك المستقيم

translations.translation: He said, 'By Your misguidance of me, I will lie in ambush for them on your straight path.
Since You led me into error," said Iblis, "I shall lie in wait for them along Your straight path.
Satan said: 'Since You have led me astray, I shall surely sit in ambush for them on Your Straight Path.
Then Satan said, "Because you have made me go astray, I shall certainly try to seduce people into straying from the right path.
He said, “Hence I swear by the fact that You sent me astray, I will certainly lay in wait for them on Your Straight Path.”
(Iblis) said: "Because You have `Aghwaytni', surely, I will sit in wait against them (human beings) on Your straight path.
He said: As Thou hast caused me to remain disappointed I will certainly lie in wait for them in Thy straight path.
Said he, 'Now, for Thy perverting me, I shall surely sit in ambush for them on Thy straight path;
He said: Now, because Thou hast sent me astray, verily I shall lurk in ambush for them on Thy Right Path.
Then Satan said, "Because You have put me in the wrong, I will lie in ambush for them on Your straight path:
He said: because Thou hast seduced me, I will beset for them Thy straight path.
‘As You have consigned me to perversity,’ he said, ‘I will surely lie in wait for them on Your straight path.
He said: "Because thou hast thrown me out of the way, lo! I will lie in wait for them on thy straight way:
(Iblis) said: "Because You have sent me astray, surely I will sit in wait against them (human beings) on Your Straight Path.
he answered: 'Because You have caused me to go astray, I will waylay them as they walk on Your Straight Path,
He said, “Because you have lured me, I will waylay them on Your straight path.
[Satan] said, "Because You have put me in error, I will surely sit in wait for them on Your straight path.

[7:16]   Said he, ‘Now, because You have sent me astray (fa-bi-mā aghwaytanī means bi-ighwā’ik, ‘for Your sending me astray’: the bā’ is for oaths, and the response of the oath is [the following]) verily I shall sit in ambush for them, that is, for the Children of Adam, on Your straight path, that is, on the path that leads to You.

(He) Iblis (said: Now, because Thou hast sent me astray) just as You made me err from guidance, (verily I shall lurk in ambush for them) for the children of Adam (on Thy Right Path) the religion of Islam.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ قَالَ فَبِمَآ أَغْوَيْتَنِي } أي: فبسبب ما بعدتني وأطردتني لأجلهم { لأَقْعُدَنَّ } وألزمن البتة { لَهُمْ } لإغوائهم وإضلالهم { صِرَاطَكَ ٱلْمُسْتَقِيمَ } [الأعراف: 16] أي: على دينك وطريقتك الموصل لهم إلى توحيدك
 أغويهم وأوسوسهم بأنواع الوسوسة بعضهمب بالفسق والظلم
 وبعضهم بالرياء والسمعة
 وبعضهم بالمخائل الفاسدة من اللذات الوهمية والخيالية
 وبالجملة: أوسوسهم وأخرجهم بأنواع الحيل عن جادة توحيدك

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: [الحِجر:38] وهو نفخ الصور النخة الأولى، { قال فبِمَا أغويتني } أي: بعد أن أمهلتني لأجتهدن في إغوائهم بأي طريق يمكنني، بسبب إغوائك إياي، والله { لأقعدنّ لهم صراطك المستقيم } ، وهو الطريق الذي يوصلهم إليك، فأقعد فيه، وأردهم عنه، { ثم لآتينّهم من بين أيديهم ومن خلفهم وعن أيمانهم وعن شمائلهم } فآتيهم من الجهات الأربع، وذلك عبارة عن تسلطه على بني آدم كيفما أمكنه
